mata danena andamata chandraprema mahatha 1957 di ewakata siti aandukarawaraya wisin path karannata yeduna 1959 di elidakwanta yeduna "buddha shasana komishan sabha warthawa" kiyawa natha. 2009 wasaredi eli dakwannata yeduna "shri lankawe bauddhayan sadachara wirodhi ha kuta upakrama magin anyagamwalata harawa ganima pilibandawa pariksha kara bala wartha kirima sandaha path karanu labu komishan sabha warthawa" kiyawa natha.

dewahuwa, galewela, dambaulla, sigiriya, naula aadi pradeshayanwala mewara loku lunu aswanna ithamath saruwata pawathiyath, nosithu andamata adahalunu dharanipatha warshawa nisa lunu aswanu kunuwi winasha wenna patangena thibe.laksha ganan wiyadamkota aswanu nelaganimata aasannawa thibiyadi eka digatama dina gananawak pawathi wassa nisa lunu wagawa siyayata panahakatath wada (50%) wadiyen kunuwi dadi lesa winasha wemin pawathi.

"mathiwarana kal damima sandaha nithi panawimata atha esawu ayama ada niyojitha pa්rajathantha්rawadayak gana bana deshana karayi" "kupa්rakata angili salakunu panatha, pa්rathi tha්rastha panatha aadi dadi mardanakari ana panath gena ayama ada ee kisiwak nodannak men pa්rajathantha්rawadayak gana katha karayi" "owun pa්rajathantha්rawadaya lesa artha dakwanne owunge bala wyapruthi misa janathawage saba pa්rajathantha්rawadi ayithin nowe.

puja bhumiye athyawashya angayakwa thibu purawidya kauthukagara godanangilla sandaha mulgala thabimata da medinata niyamitha ya.maharagama siri wajiranyana dharmayathanaye tharunasila samadana poson poda pinkama mese ya.poda perawaru, 06.00 – 07.00 sil samadan karawima, anushasanawa ha buddha pujawa winayacharya hingurakgoda wibhawi mahimi, 08.00 – 09.00 bhawanawa walimada pasannamanasa himi, 09.00 –10.00 dharma deshanawa wahumuwe wijayawansa mahimi, 10.00 – 11.15 paropakara sangrahaya, dharma deshanawa ha buddha pujawa shasthrapathi panditha mahaoya anuruddha himi, paswaru 12.25 – 12.30 wishesha niwedana ha punyanumodanawa, 12.30 – 01.00 pirith ha theruwan guna kumarathanne chandananda himi, 01.00 – 2.00 dharma sakachchawa shasthrapathi panditha panadure pasanna himi, 02.00 – 03.00 wesesi desuma aacharya gamini rathna shri mahatha, 03.00 – 04.00 dharma deshanawa madawala dhammika jinawansa mahimi, 04.15 – 5.00 dhammapadaya, shasthrapathi panditha gabbela wajira himi, 05.00 – 06.00 dharma deshanawa diyathalawe piyadassi himi, 06.00 – 06.30 bodhi pujawa meheyawima, shasthrapathi panditha hakmana sumanasiri mahimi.
